Page.title: I structure digital interfaces to scale consistently.
Page.about:
I'm a UI Engineer with 15 years of experience combining design and development.

Specialist in Design Systems, React, and scalable front-end structuring.

I've been creating visual systems in production for over 10 years, developing complete applications with React, Node.js, and TypeScript, and structuring technical departments from scratch.

Recognized by Microsoft in 2016 for UX concept.

My focus: consistency, scalability, and a solid foundation for product growth.

Projects.title: Projects
Projects.project-description01: Corporate design system in production for over 10 years, used daily by the creative team. Standardized processes, reduced weekly work hours by 10, and maintains a 95% client approval rate.
Projects.project-description02: Interface concept for Windows 10 Mobile officially recognized by Microsoft in 2016. Innovative user experience proposal for the mobile operating system.
Projects.project-description03: Digital wallpaper that reached over 20,000 downloads on the WallpaperHub platform, demonstrating the ability to create products with visual appeal and organic reach.
Projects.project-description04: Complete development of the institutional website including infrastructure, hosting, and maintenance. Creation of the IT department from scratch with the implementation of the entire digital structure.
Projects.project-description05: Internal web system for managing materials and processes of the printing company. Automated workflows and integrated departments.
Projects.project-description06: Complete leadership of the design department, creating visual identity, digital marketing campaigns, and corporate materials for a recruitment company.
